beer.beer_description:
Perhaps you heard of a worldwide beer-movement that tributes favourite hipster neighbourhoods across the globe. First came Istedgade, Copenhagen. Then Södermalm, Stockholm. Followed by  Williamsburg, New York and Shoreditch, London, accompanied by Trastevere, Rome and last year El Raval, Barcelona.

If you feel excluded because you’re hip but your city is not., this cutting-edge, ‘hip without border’ pale ale is a homage to you – the global hipster. Cheers!

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 18!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 175 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 36!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 3! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 30 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 7.
